Location: 200 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 202 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Note: Arnold's scalable and memory-efficient single-pass architecture for path tracing, its authors' publication of the underlying techniques, and its broad industry acceptance were instrumental in leading a widespread adoption of fully ray-traced rendering for motion pictures.

Location: 336 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 337 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 338 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 340 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Note: OSL is a highly optimized runtime architecture and language for programmable shading and texturing that has become a de facto industry standard. It enables artists at all levels of technical proficiency to create physically plausible materials for efficient production rendering.

Location: 341 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 342 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Note: The Animatronic Horse Puppet provides increased actor safety, close integration with live action, and improved realism for filmmakers.

Location: 339 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Note: The Technoprops head-mounted camera system, with its modular and production-proven construction, supports consistent face alignment with improved actor comfort, while at the same time permitting quick reconfiguration and minimizing downtime. Location: 340 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 342 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 343 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States

Location: 345 Washington Square South, New York, NY 10012, United States
